attributes.action: Make it illegal to take pictures of children and/or faces in public places
attributes.additional_details: Me and my family went out Apex Park in Highbridge Somerset, I strange person took photos of my sister and other children with a camera and taking photos of children playing right up in there face, the police now have said that this is completely legal, How can a stranger taking photos of your child and/or children be legal? The law needs to change to take photos of children in public places, especially with children being bullied and harassed , let’s get this law changed to make this illegal!
attributes.background: To make illegal to take photos of children in public places that should be illegal, as of right now it is legal to take photos of children is completely legal

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/734798
